scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.test11: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && jest auction.test.js -t 'Reset existing tokens' --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test14: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && jest auction.test.js -t 'Vote for tokens on auction' --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test15: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && jest auction.test.js -t 'Add rewards' --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test16: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && jest auction.test.js -t 'Finalize auction' --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test17: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && jest auction.test.js -t 'Claim rewards' --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test18: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && jest auction.test.js -t 'Looser withdraw bids' --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test19: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && jest auction.test.js -t 'Looser withdraw rewards' --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test110: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && jest auction.test.js -t 'Withdraw winner bid' --useStderr --verbose false
